Figure 3:Overview of our method. For each trajectory, we compute stepwise rewards as the pure incremental effect of the current SDE sampling. We then identify the orange turning point that satisfies Definition4.1or Remark5.2. Next, we assign cumulative rewards to capture their implicit impact on reversing the reward trend. Finally, we apply group normalization independently at each timestep.
